elements.description: Initialise Firebase Remote Config. Generates CONFIG_INITIALIZE or CONFIG_ERROR
elements.name: remoteconfig.init

parameters.doc: Function to call when a remote config event has happened
parameters.name: callback

elements.description: Fetches config data from the server. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#fetch). Generates CONFIG_FETCHED or CONFIG_ERROR
elements.name: remoteconfig.fetch

elements.description: Asynchronously activates the most recently fetched configs, so that the fetched key value pairs take effect. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#activate). Generates CONFIG_ACTIVATED or CONFIG_ERROR
elements.name: remoteconfig.activate

elements.description: Asynchronously fetches and then activates the fetched configs. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#fetchandactivate). Generates CONFIG_FETCHED and CONFIG_ACTIVATED or CONFIG_ERROR
elements.name: remoteconfig.fetch_and_activate

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a bool. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#getboolean)
elements.name: remoteconfig.get_boolean

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, as a vector of raw byte-data. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#getdata)
elements.name: remoteconfig.get_data

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a double. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#getdouble)
elements.name: remoteconfig.get_number

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a string. (Official docs https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/cpp/class/firebase/remote-config/remote-config#getstring)
elements.name: remoteconfig.get_string

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

parameters.doc: Key-value pairs representing the default values. Generates CONFIG_DEFAULTS_SET or CONFIG_ERROR
parameters.name: defaults

elements.description: Event generated when remote config has been initialized and is ready for use
elements.name: remoteconfig.CONFIG_INITIALIZED

elements.description: Event generated when an error occurred.
elements.name: remoteconfig.CONFIG_ERROR

elements.description: Event generated when the default values have been set
elements.name: remoteconfig.CONFIG_DEFAULTS_SET

elements.description: Event generated when the remote config has been fetched
elements.name: remoteconfig.CONFIG_FETCHED

elements.description: Event generated when the remote config has been activated
elements.name: remoteconfig.CONFIG_ACTIVATED

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Firebase Remote Config
info.name: remoteconfig
